list-item.p:
Rhodiola: for temporary relief of symptoms of stress, such as fatigue and sensation of weakness, in Austria, Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, and the United Kingdom.
1

Ginseng
2 and Eleutherococcus
3 : for the relief of symptoms of asthenia (abnormal loss of strength and energy) such as tiredness and weakness in France, Germany, Lithuania, Poland, Spain, and Sweden.
